# hasAction

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that controls whether the notification shows or hides the alert action.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var hasAction: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Assign [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] to this property to hide the alert button or slider. (This effect requires [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UILocalNotification/alertBody] to be non-`nil`.) The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Composing the alert

- **alertBody**: The message displayed in the notification alert.
- **alertAction**: The title of the action button or slider.
- **alertTitle**: A short description of the reason for the alert.
- **alertLaunchImage**: Identifies the image used as the launch image when the user taps (or slides) the action button (or slider).
- **category**: The name of a group of actions to display in the alert.
